title: Nonna's Sauce

part_1: Handful of carrots or two large carrots
part_2: 2 lbs ground pork and ground beef mix
Diced tomatoes, or plain tomato sauce
1 cup heavy whipping cream (added at end)

instructions: Part 1: Blend celery, carrots, onion, and pancetta/mortadella, then put in big pan.
Add wine, water, tomato paste, diced tomatoes/sauce, and seasonings.
Cook for at least an hour and up to 6 hours.
Add a cup of heavy whipping cream around the end.
